text: We demonstrate that the capsid protein VP1 of CVB3 induces cell cycle arrests at G1 phase through the increased expression of Hsp70, which is up-regulated by the elevated phosphorylation of HSF1. The increased Hsp70 results in the reduced level of cyclin E and the accumulation of p27 Kip1 . Furthermore, G1 arrest facilitates the replication of CVB3.
